operations.summary: Get book_tag for a particular call_number
operations.notes: Returns three items: base 64 representation of the call_number in book_tag, the original call number in call_number, and result. result will be SUCCESS if everything worked. If not, it will be ERROR, followed by an explanatory message. The returned call_number is made by first converting to base-64, and then converting back, as a way of double-checking that the process worked.

parameters.name: call_number
parameters.description: LC Call Number. Must be URL-encoded. Example: NX543%20.c38%202000
